hibernate-mapping.query: from com.redhat.rhn.domain.kickstart.KickstartSession as t where t.newServer = :server or t.oldServer = :server or t.hostServer = :server order by created desc
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.kickstart.KickstartSession as t where t.ksdata = :ksdata and t.kickstartMode = :mode order by created desc

from KickstartSession s where (s.oldServer in (:servers) or s.newServer in (:servers)) and s.action in (:actions_to_delete) and not exists (select 1 from KickstartSessionState ss where ss.id = s.state and ss.label in ('failed', 'complete'))
